description: Java class representing a JPA entity for a chess game record with fields for game state, players, and timestamps.

classes.name: Game
classes.description: JPA entity for storing information about a chess game, including game id, status, turn, players, move history, and timestamps.

methods.name: prePersist
methods.description: Sets creation and update timestamps before persisting a new Game entity.

methods.name: preUpdate
methods.description: Updates the timestamp before updating an existing Game entity.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the game.

methods.name: getCurrentFEN
methods.description: Returns the current FEN string representing the game state.

methods.name: getTurn
methods.description: Returns which player's turn it is.

methods.name: setTurn
methods.description: Sets which player's turn it is.

methods.name: getWhitePlayerId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the white player.

methods.name: setWhitePlayerId
methods.description: Sets the ID of the white player.

methods.name: getBlackPlayerId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the black player.

methods.name: setBlackPlayerId
methods.description: Sets the ID of the black player.

methods.name: getMoveHistory
methods.description: Returns the move history as a string.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the game was created.

methods.name: getUpdatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the game was last updated.
